'''''Radio Silence''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Challenger: Series V]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to get locked on by the [[Thunder Manifestation]] before they can attack it.

==Trivia==
*The achievement name is a reference to the term "{{w|radio silence}}."
